TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content:
Steam exp build just updated.

Ok they are still alive

yep and we still have hype jobs.
Good, almost 2 days between updates. I think they are still messing with us though.

I'm so happy to be in such a cool community and playing such a lovely game

And this Hype is amazing
#soExcited #theHypening #camelCasing
Wow. Maxmaps said via twitter that the feature video is soon. I can already feel the HypePressure building!

Maxmaps also said that the video will be 6 minutes long, and the blooper reel 17 hours. https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/542033016479301633

Anyway to embed a tweet?

Edit: SteamDB update, experimentals.

I feel that riding the hype train is like watching grass grow.

My wife keeps telling me that I have to get some chores done, and I'm like "NO! I must watch the grass grow! It's exiting! The beta could come out any time now!"

Edit: I noticed that mine is the only post on this page with no emoticon, so .

Edited December 12, 2014 by Zipmafia

wow. Maxmaps said via twitter that the feature video is soon. i can already feel the hypepressure building!

HypePressure!!!

Edited December 12, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff

Done with finals, time to get some spacegame on!

Come out when ever your ready game! ill be waiting haha
Hold on only 365 Pages? WHY NO HYPE????

Done with finals, time to get some spacegame on!

Come out when ever your ready game! ill be waiting haha

Finals will be next week for me.

Edited December 12, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff
Grammar? Who needs grammar?

Nah they can't betray the NÃ‚Â°1 rule.

Video day = update day

They can't ... right ?
Haven't they released a feature vid before the release? I think it's the cinematic that will be on release day.

Nah they can't betray the NÃ‚Â°1 rule.

Video day = update day

They can't ... right ?

However, the features video =/= release video. It's generally the video posted with Maxmaps going all the features in the newest update, typically posted between a few days to a week before the update itself drops.

The features video also signifies the beginning of the media release, meaning we'll get to see Scott Manley and all the other Youtubers/streamers show off the features as well!
I sent too many ships into the sun and therefore don't have enough funds for a HYPEticket. Would someone let me stowaway in their luggage?
I don't have that much luggage, but I have a jet-powered triplane that I used to get here. I figure, you might be able to tie a rope to the brakevan and to the plane and glide behind it.

I sent too many ships into the sun and therefore don't have enough funds for a HYPEticket. Would someone let me stowaway in their luggage?

YOU CAN'T MISS OUT ON ALL THE HYPE!!!!!!

*Gives ImJake a ticket*
I can feel the train getting closer!

I can feel the train getting closer!

Then,

SPLAT!

Max said by the end of the week we will have the gameplay trailer, so I have my bets on tonight's squadcast.

Might want to start warming up the engines...

*stands beside the HypeTrain*

*watches HypeTrain leave without me*

*boards Hey-that-update-looks-pretty-niceTrain*

Watch the media team. They get early access at least 48+ hours prior to release, in order that they can make their vids and get them through youtube's content ID checks before being made public. If they all stop doing KSP vids for more than a day... be suspicious.

We're approaching Squadcast Station. I wonder what will await us there... sounds like we can expect a huge shipment of HypeCoal though.

Bring her up to 99% lightspeed! Let's hit beta with a bang!
SteamDB experimentals update.

I have been trying to break free from the evil clutches that are finals! I will tell my story quick as my nemesis Mr. Study is searching for me as I write this!

I was about to board the Hypetrain, ticket and luggage in hand, when suddenly finals initiated its diabolical scheme across the nations, searching eagerly for helpless students to prey upon. I am just one of the many who has fallen into this situation, but lucky enough to temporarily escape it.

Ahhh! Mr. Study has found me again and is already pulling me from my freedom!! Hype on, my friends!

hype on...
